issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://adguard.com/ko/article/how-to-block-ads-on-youtube.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadguard.com%2Fko%2Farticle%2Fhow-to-block-ads-on-youtube.html) ### Comment > 크롬브라우저에서 adguard 확장프로그램을 켠 상태에서 > 유튜브 영상이 두번 이상 들리고 렉도 걸립니다. Username: `@안형주` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/l81sy8sdvpsc484g4g00kc0os4g4wsd8n4k68hkwg8.png?nc=1)

### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.53 System version: | Windows 10 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

List-KR Other extensions used: | V3 Lite

comment.body:
AdGuard는 관련 없는 이슈 같습니다.
RemoveAdblockThing 유져스크립트를 제거해주세요.
https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/commit/d0370b5cc1fa5b4d741eebf45a93288bace260b9

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment > I don't follow these things and in the past, they didn't show with AdGuard enabled, but these days, it's more of this than content I want to see. ### Screenshots

Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,

https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Other extensions used: | Way too much garbage on Facebook and Twitter these days that doesn't get filtered, which used to be filtered in the past. It kind of makes me regret paying for your software, since it no longer does what I bought it for. ### Import issue configuration (AdGuard for Windows) [Import](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=adguard%3Aimport_user_configuration%3F%3Fbrowsing_security.enabled%3Dtrue%26browsing_security.statistics_enabled%3Dfalse%26dns.custom_bootstrap%3D%26dns.custom_fallback%3D%26dns.enabled%3Dtrue%26dns.fallback_mode%3DSystem%26dns.filters%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fwindows%252Ffilters%252F15.txt%252CUser%2Brules%26dns.filters_enabled%3Dtrue%26dns.servers%3DSystem%26dns.timeout%3D0%26filters%3D109.202.225.227.233.243.249.253.13.16.17.1.224.2.3.6.7.8%26license_type%3Dpaid%26parental_control.enabled%3Dfalse%26product_type%3DWin%26product_version%3D7.17.1%2B%25284709%2529%26referrer%3D%26stealth.DNT%3Dtrue%26stealth.block_third_party_auth%3Dfalse%26stealth.block_trackers%3Dtrue%26stealth.disable_third_party_cache%3Dtrue%26stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service%3Dfalse%26stealth.disable_windows_defender%3Dfalse%26stealth.disable_windows_telemetry%3Dtrue%26stealth.dpi%3Dfalse%26stealth.enabled%3Dtrue%26stealth.flash%3Dfalse%26stealth.hide_search_queries%3Dtrue%26stealth.java%3Dfalse%26stealth.location%3Dfalse%26stealth.push%3Dfalse%26stealth.strip_url%3Dtrue%26stealth.third_party_cookies%3D180%26stealth.turn_off_advertising_id%3Dtrue%26stealth.webrtc%3Dfalse%26stealth.x_client%3Dtrue%26url%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fadguard.com%252Fen%252Fwelcome.html%26user_agent%3DMozilla%252F5.0%2B%2528Windows%2BNT%2B10.0%253B%2BWin64%253B%2Bx64%2529%2BAppleWebKit%252F537.36%2B%2528KHTML%252C%2Blike%2BGecko%2529%2BChrome%252F124.0.0.0%2BSafari%252F537.36%26userscripts%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%252Chttps%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%26win.wfp%3Dtrue)
